name: Easter Bunny Egg Hunt Run and Jump Collect them All
name_original: Easter Bunny Egg Hunt Run and Jump Collect them All
description:
Are you ready to hunt for easter eggs?

Are you ready to run, jump and collect as many as you can while escaping pesky fox's and jumping over ledges!

Get ready for this epic easter bunny egg hunt run and jumping game where you have to collect them all!

Featuring:
- Great easter holiday artwork and animations
- Fun tap to jump gameplay
- Fun for the kids and all the family!
